subject: Soccer
lead_paragraph: Inter Milan won the Club World Cup on Saturday in Abu Dhabi, beating T.P. Mazembe of Democratic Republic of Congo, 3-0, and ending the surprising run of the African club champion.
snippet: Inter Milan won the Club World Cup on Saturday in Abu Dhabi, beating T.P. Mazembe of Democratic Republic of Congo, 3-0, and ending the surprising run of the African club champion.
